name: @elysiajs/cors
description: Plugin for Elysia that for Cross Origin Requests (CORs)

scripts.test:node: npm install --prefix ./test/node/cjs/ && npm install --prefix ./test/node/esm/ && node ./test/node/cjs/index.js && node ./test/node/esm/index.js
scripts.build: rimraf dist && tsc --project tsconfig.esm.json && tsc --project tsconfig.cjs.json
scripts.release: npm run build && npm run test && npm publish --access public
